src_original: tathā hy anutpannāryadharmaḥ sattvasantānaḥ pṛthagjana ity ucyate /  āryadharmotpādāt tv ārya iti //
tgt_original: 異生性者，謂於聖法不得，假立異生性。

src_original: pravṛttiḥ katamā /  hetuphalaprabandhānupacchedaḥ pravṛttir ity ucyate /
tgt_original: 流轉者，謂於因果相續不斷，假立流轉。

src_original: naikasmin kṣaṇe prabandhoparame vā pravṛttyupacāraḥ //
tgt_original: 所以唯於相續不斷立流轉者，於一剎那或於間斷無此言故。

src_original: pratiniyamaḥ katamaḥ /  hetuphalanānātve pratiniyamavyavasthā /
tgt_original: 定異者，謂於因果種種差別，假立定異。

src_original: hetuphalanānātvaṃ punar iṣṭasya viṣayasya sucaritam ,  aniṣṭasya duścaritam ityādi phalānāṃ pṛthag anyonyahetutā //
tgt_original: 因果種種差別者，謂可愛果妙行為因、不可愛果惡行為因，諸如是等種種因果展轉差別。

src_original: yogaḥ katamaḥ /  hetuphalānurūpye yoga iti prajñaptiḥ /
tgt_original: 相應者，謂於因果相稱假立相應。

src_original: tadyathā dānasya bhogasampad anurūpeti yujyate dānasya bhogasampat phalam //
tgt_original: 因果相稱者，雖復異類，因果相順亦名相稱，由如布施感富財等。

src_original: javaḥ katamaḥ /  hetuphalāśupravṛttau java iti prajñaptiḥ //
tgt_original: 勢速者，謂於因果迅疾流轉，假立勢速。

src_original: anukramaḥ katamaḥ /  hetuphalaikaikapravṛttāv anukrama iti prajñaptiḥ /
tgt_original: 次第者，謂於因果一一流轉，假立次第。

src_original: ekaikatvena pravṛttir ayugapatpravṛttiḥ //
tgt_original: 因果一一流轉者，謂不俱轉。

src_original: [p. 88] kālaḥ katamaḥ /  hetuphalaprabandhapravṛttau kāla iti prajñaptiḥ /
tgt_original: 時者，謂於因果相續流轉，假立為時。 何以故？

src_original: hetuphalayoḥ prabandhena pravṛttau satyāṃ yat tatra hetuphalam utpannaniruddham ,  so 'tītaḥ kāla iti prajñapyate /
tgt_original: 由有因果相續轉故。 若此因果已生已滅，立過去時。

src_original: yad anutpannaṃ so 'nāgataḥ /  yad utpannāniruddhaṃ sa pratyutpannaḥ kālaḥ //
tgt_original: 此若未生，立未來時。 已生未滅，立現在時。

src_original: deśaḥ katamaḥ /  pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarādharordhvāsu sarvato daśasu dikṣu hetuphala eva deśa iti prajñaptiḥ /
tgt_original: 方者，謂即於東西南北四維上下因果差別，假立為方。 何以故？

src_original: hetuphalasya digvyāptau deśopacāraḥ /
tgt_original: 即於十方因果遍滿，假說方故。

src_original: rūpasaṅgṛhītaṃ ca hetuphalaṃ veditavyam ,  arūpiṇāṃ digvyāpanāsāmarthyāt //
tgt_original: 當知此中唯說色法所攝因果，無色之法遍布處所無功能故。

src_original: saṅkhyā katamā /  saṃskārāṇāṃ pratyekaśo bhede saṅkhyeti prajñaptiḥ /
tgt_original: 數者，謂於諸行一一差別，假立為數。

src_original: tadviparītam anapatrāpyam /  lokaśāstraviruddham etan mayā kriyata /  ity evam avagacchato 'pi yānayā pāpakriyayālajjā ,  sānapatrāpyam /  etac ca dvayam api sarvakleśopakleśasāhāyyakarmakam /
tgt_original: 無慚者，貪瞋癡分，於諸過惡不自恥為體，一切煩惱及隨煩惱助伴為業。

src_original: rāgadveṣamohaprakāreṣu sarvasatkāyaprasavahetuṣu rāgadveṣayor ayaugapadyād yathāsambhavaṃ prajñapyate ,  na svatantre sta iti //  styānaṃ cittākarmaṇyatā /  paryāyāntareṇa vyācaṣṭe -- rstaimityam iti /  stimitabhāvaḥ staimityam ,
tgt_original: 無愧者，貪瞋癡分，於諸過惡不羞他為體，業如無慚說。

src_original: yadyogāc cittaṃ jaḍībhāvāt stimitam iva bhavati ,  nālambanaṃ pratipattum utsahate /  etac ca sarvakleśopakleśasāhāyyakarmakam /  mohāṃśe prajñaptatvāc ca prajñaptita eva ,  na dravyataḥ //
tgt_original: 惛沈者，謂愚癡分，心無堪任為體，障毘鉢舍那為業。 掉舉者，謂貪欲分，隨念淨相心不寂靜為體，障奢摩他為業。

src_original: auddhatyaṃ cittasyāvyupaśamaḥ /  vyupaśamo hi śamathaḥ /  tadviru[p. 70]ddho 'vyupaśamaḥ /  sa punā rāgānukūlaḥ pūrvahasitaramitakrīḍitādy anusmarato rāgāṃśikaś cetaso 'vyupaśamahetuḥ /
tgt_original: 隨念淨相者，謂追憶往昔隨順貪欲戲笑等故，心不寂靜。

src_original: śamathaparipanthakarmakam //  śraddhāvipakṣa iti /  śraddhāstitvaguṇavattvaśakyatveṣv abhisampratyayaḥ prasādo 'bhilāṣaś ca yathākramam /  aśraddhātadviparyayeṇāstitvaguṇavattvaśakyatveṣvasampratyayo 'prasādo 'nabhilāṣaś ca /  kauśīdyasanniśrayadānakarmakam /
tgt_original: 不信者，謂愚癡分，於諸善法心不忍可、心不清淨、心不悕望為體，懈怠所依為業。

src_original: aśraddhadhānasya prayogacchandābhāvāt kausīdyasanniśrayadānakarmakatvam //  kuśale kāyavāṅmanaḥkarmaṇi nidrāpārśvaśayanasukham āgamya yo mohāṃśikaś cetaso 'nabhyutsāhaḥ ,  sa kausīdyam /  kutsitaṃ sīdatīti kusīdaḥ /  vīryavipakṣaḥ /  vīryavipakṣa iti /  vīryaṃ hi kuśalapakṣaprayoge cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ ,
tgt_original: 懈怠所依者，由不信故，無有方便加行樂欲。

src_original: tadvipakṣatvāt kausīdyam /  etac ca kuśalapakṣaprayogaparipanthakarmakam //  [p. 71] lobhadveṣamohakausīdyeṣu pramādaḥ prajñapyate ,  yathāvyākhyāteṣu /  ayaṃ cākuśalavṛddhikuśalaparihāṇisaṃniśrayadānakarmakaḥ //  muṣitasmṛtitā kliṣṭā smṛtiḥ /
tgt_original: 懈怠者，謂愚癡分，依著睡眠倚臥為樂，心不策勵為體，障修方便善品為業。

src_original: kliṣṭeti kleśasamprayuktā /  kuśalasyānabhilapanateti -- na hi kleśasamprayuktā smṛtiḥ kleśenābhinnaviṣayatvāt kuśalam abhilapituṃ samarthā /  iyaṃ ca vikṣepasanniśrayadānakarmikā //  vividhaṃ kṣipyate 'nena cittam iti vikṣepaḥ /  yai rāgadveṣamohaiś cittaṃ samādhyālambanād bahir visāryate ,
tgt_original: 放逸者，依止懈怠及貪瞋癡，不修善法，於有漏法心不防護為體，增惡損善所依為業。

src_original: teṣu yathāsambhavam upakleśātmako vikṣepaḥ prajñapyate /  eṣa ca vairāgyaparipanthakarmakaḥ //  asamprajanyaṃ kleśasamprayuktā prajñā /
tgt_original: 忘念者，煩惱相應念為體，散亂所依為業。

src_original: karaṇīyākaraṇīyājñānāc cāpattisanniśrayadānakarmakam /
tgt_original: 應爾者，謂所許時設復非時，或因病患或為調適。

src_original: kutsitaṃ kṛtam iti kukṛtam /  tadbhāvaḥ kaukṛtyam /  kukṛtaviṣayaś cetaso vilekhaḥ kaukṛtyam [p. 72] ucyate ,  caitasikādhikārāt /
tgt_original: 越失所作依止為業者，謂依隨煩惱性睡眠說。

src_original: abhipretam anabhipretaṃ kuśalam akuśalam avyākṛtaṃ kāle 'kāle yuktam ayuktaṃ ca kṛtvākṛtvā vā mohāṃśikaś cetaso vipratisāraḥ kaukṛtyam /  tac ca cittasthitiparipanthakarmakam /
tgt_original: 惡作者，依樂作不樂作、應作不應作，是愚癡分，心追悔為體，或善或不善或無記、或時或非時、或應爾或不應爾，能障心住為業。

src_original: anabhiratipūrvakaṃ yat kriyate ,
tgt_original: 樂作者，樂欲為先，造善惡行。

src_original: anabhipretaṃ punaḥ parair balād avaṣṭabhya yat kāryate ,  kleśābhibhavād vā yat karoti /  kālo yāvan na viramati ,  akālas tadūrdhvam /  yuktaṃ sthāne ,  ayuktam asthāne /  tac cāpi trividham ,  kuśalam akuśalam avyākṛtaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 不樂作者，由他勢力及諸煩惱之所驅逼，令有所作如其所應。

src_original: mohāṃśikam ity upakleśasaṅgṛhītam atra gṛhyate //
tgt_original: 愚癡分者，隨煩惱所攝。

src_original: kṛtyātipattisanniśrayadānakarmakam /  atra cākuśala eva mohāṃśikaḥ ,  nānyaḥ //
tgt_original: 不應爾者，於非處。

src_original: vitarkaḥ paryeṣako manojalpaś cetanāprajñāviśeṣaḥ /  paryeṣakaḥ kim etad iti nirūpaṇākārapravṛttaḥ /  manaḥsvabhāvo jalpo manojalpaḥ /  jalpa iva jalpo 'rthakathanam /
tgt_original: 尋者，或依思或依慧尋求意言，令心麁為體。

src_original: cetanāprajñāviśeṣa iti cetanāyāś cittaparispandātmakatvāt prajñāyāś ca guṇadoṣavivekākāratvāt /
tgt_original: 依思依慧者，於推度不推度位，如其次第追求行相意言分別。
